thread.title: Nominations open to honour SA ICT achievers
thread.title_full: Nominations open to honour SA ICT achievers

author: Admin
title: Nominations open to honour SA ICT achievers
text:
Nominations open to honour SA ICT achievers 
By TINTSWALO BALOYI JOHANNESBURG, (CAJ News) – NOMINATIONS for the South African Information and Communications Technologies Achievers Awards are now open. 
Organizers of the event, the South African Communications Forum (SACF), confirmed the progress. 
“Anyone can nominate worthy ICT personalities who have spearheaded innovative and transformational initiatives in the pivotal Information & Communications Technology sector,” said SACF Chairperson, Lucky Masilela. 
Minister of Telecommunications and Postal Services, Siyabonga Cwele, will be the keynote speaker at the Awards Gala Dinner on October 2 to be held at the Vodacom World Dome in Midrand. 
Vodacom, the country’s biggest mobile network operator, is the lead project sponsor and a platinum SACF member. Members of the SACF include industry leaders such as Vodacom, MTN, Telkom, Broadband Infraco, Cell C, SA Post Office Sentech, Dimension Data, Neotel, eTv, Ericsson and Huawei. 
“The organisers of the ICT Achievers Awards are looking forward to receiving a good number of high quality nominations based on the excellent calibre of individuals currently achieving in the ICT and Broadcast sectors,” concluded Masilela. 
Categories include Entrepreneurship and SMME, Community Development, Local Content Production, Innovation, Future Leader, Women in ICT, Honorary Lifetime Achievers Award and Innovation for Africa Award. 
– CAJ  //cajnewsafrica.com/?p=7481   14 2015. Filed under Featured , Finance , Technology
